alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 17 at 3:38PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH TOMORROW EVENING... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by consistent rainfall, heavy at times continues to be possible WHERE...along all islands of American Samoa WHEN...Through tomorrow evening IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may case ponding on the roadways and rapidly rising streams throughout the territory. Be prepared for heavy rainfall, which may be slow moving. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An active trough over the islands will liley produce widespread showers with embedded thunderstorms causing floods and potential landslides. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 311 Aoauli Aso Lulu Me 17 2023 ...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA SE`IA OO I LE AFIAFI A TAEAO... MAFUAAGA...O lologa e mafua mai i timuga, mamafa i taimi o lo`o fa`aauau pea NOFOAGA...mo Amerika Samoa atoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le afiafi a taeao AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa e mafai ona lolovaia ai luga o auala tele faapea le siisii vave o auvai. E tatau ona e fa`alogologo pea i tala o le tau aua lou nofo sauniuni mo ni lapata`iga o tafega ma lologa e tu`u atu. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga louloua o le tau o le a tumau i luga o le atunu`u, o le a fa`atupula`ia ai le tetele o timuga fa`apea faititili, ma o le mafua ai lologa fa`apea sologa. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
